Achieving Goals.first: Prioritize tasks to ensure you are managing your time efficiently!
Achieving Goals.second: Avoid multitasking. Focus on one goal at a time!
Achieving Goals.fourth: Optimize your routine and kick out distractions!

How To Be Consistent.fifth: Take care of your health! Get good sleep and eat healthy!
How To Be Consistent.sixth: Be realistic! Do not force yourself to do too much, especially if you are starting!
How To Be Consistent.seventh: Take regular break to combat burnout!
